help:
To start downloading, simply pass an {{E621}} search to this script like so:
{{SEARCH}}
imageUrlNull: Not downloading post #{{POST}} because its file URL is null. (probably on the default blacklist)
downloadInterrupted: Download interrupted after {{COUNT}} file(s). ({{DATA}}) It will resume from this position if you run the same command again.
updatedAll: All your archives have been updated, {{USER}}.
configNotFound: Config file not found. Creating a new one.
noArchiveInfo: Couldn't load .info file from {{FOLDER}}; no new images will be downloaded here.
archiveNoQuery: .info file in {{FOLDER}} does not specify an {{E621}} query; no new images will be downloaded here.

errors.mustBeWholeNumber: ERROR: {{VALUE}} must be a whole number.
